text: Mischa Zverev was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Frances Tiafoe won the title after defeating Tennys Sandgren 6–3, 6–4 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Sarasota Open - Singles 2017 Singles
title: 2017 Sarasota Open – Singles
